lemma: heart be in the right place
definitions: To have good intentions, even if the results are not successful or the methods are clumsy.
To be a kind and well-meaning person, despite any flaws or mistakes.
examples: He always tries to help, even if he messes up; his heart's in the right place.
Her heart's in the right place, but her advice can be a bit direct.
Don't be too hard on him; his heart's in the right place.
